A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It hardly \"ruined the franchise\" like some suggest\, but it's a terrible film. The two main issues that I have with it is the pacing and the forced humor. Those two glaring flaws bleed into every disjointed decision\, magnifying the impact. I've watched every SW film dozens of times a year. TLJ I've watched 2.5 times ... couldn't even finish a third viewing.
